name: Triple X Console
description:
Every level you will be given two information, sum and product.

You need to enter 3 numbers that makes up those two information.

EXAMPLES:

The sum is 11

The product is 40

Answer: 2, 4, 5

The sum (2 + 4 + 5) is 11

The product (2 x 4 x 5) is 40

It can be put in any order.

CONTROLS:

  • <UP> and <DOWN> arrow key to change the number value.
  • <LEFT> and <RIGHT> arrow key to switch between number.
  • <ENTER> to check your answer.

Happy thinking!
